name: Wordpress-schema-custom-post-types
tagline: Custom Post Types Initialization with theme code examples for http://www.schema.org for wordpress. All developers, designers, project managers are welcomed.
body:
# Welcome to wordpress microformat project.
The project is an attempt to create custom post types for wordpress to accurately deal with the many various schemas for **microformatting**.

## Authors and Contributors
* Founder @inetbiz

## Support or Contact
Submit an issue in the ticket system in this github project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
